description:
Yuga finds a Magic World card that belonged to his father and decides to explore its possibilities. Meanwhile, the tournament AI assigns Yuga his next opponent, a wanna-be rock star named Note Hibikase.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mage Garga! A Magic World Buddyfight!
Mahou Tsukai Garuga! Magic World no Fight!!
魔法使いガルガ! マジックワールドのファイト!!
